import sys
import collections
num = int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip())
while num != 0:
	total_guest = int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip())
	in_times = collections.Counter(int(s) for s in sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split(' '))
	out_times = collections.Counter(int(s) for s in sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split(' '))

	all_lis = in_times.keys() + out_times.keys()
	all_lis.sort()
	max_count = 0
	max = 0

	for item in all_lis:
		if item in out_times:
			max_count -= out_times[item]
			del out_times[item]
			if max_count > max:
				max = max_count
			
		elif item in in_times:
			max_count += in_times[item]
			del in_times[item]
			if max_count > max:
				max = max_count
	print max	
			
	num -= 1
